org.frans.thesis.service
Class CFTabletopClientManager

java.lang.Object
  org.frans.thesis.service.CFTabletopClientManager

public class CFTabletopClientManager
extends java.lang.Object

A class that manages all connected clients by delegating tasks to them.

Constructor Detail

CFTabletopClientManager

public CFTabletopClientManager(CFTabletopService service)
A public constructor for this class. Sets the tabletop service.

Parameters:
service - The tabletop service to which this manager belongs.
Method Detail

getNextOutgoingFileBuffer

public byte[] getNextOutgoingFileBuffer(java.lang.String clientName)
A method that gets the next array of bytes that has to be sent to the mobile device of this client. If no files are in line to be sent to the mobile device, this method sends an array with length of 1.

Parameters:
clientName - The name of the client of which the next buffer has to be returned.

publishImageOnFacebook

public void publishImageOnFacebook(java.lang.String clientName,
                                   CFFile cfFile)
Adds a given file to the queue of images of a certain client that have to be published on facebook.

Parameters:
clientName - The name of the client that has to publish the image on facebook.
cfFile - The image file that has to be published on facebook.

sendFileToClient

public void sendFileToClient(java.lang.String clientName,
                             CFFile file)
Sends a given file to a client with a given name.

Parameters:
clientName - The name of the client to which the file has to be sent.
file - The file that has to be sent to the client.

setStatus

public void setStatus(java.lang.String clientName,
                      int status)
Sets the status of a client with a given name to a given integer.

Parameters:
clientName - The name of the client of which the status has to be set.
status - The status that has to be set.
